apihelp-createapage-description: CreateAPage API module: get createplate HTML and handle switching to regular wikitext editing mode on Special:CreatePage
apihelp-createapage-summary: CreateAPage API module: get createplate HTML and handle switching to regular wikitext editing mode on Special:CreatePage
apihelp-createapage-param-template: Name of the createplate to load when the <kbd>what</kbd> param is set to <kbd>multieditparse</kbd>
apihelp-createapage-param-what: Name of the action to take, either <kbd>multieditparse</kbd> or <kbd>switchtoadvancedediting</kbd>
apihelp-createapage-example-1: Get the HTML (not wikitext) of <kbd>MediaWiki:Createplate-Actor</kbd> '''for Special:CreatePage use only!'''
apihelp-createapage-example-2: Store the user-supplied original, unmodified (by CreateAPage) wikitext into the PHP $_SESSION['article_content'] superglobal for further use
apihelp-createapage-upload-example-1: Upload an image from an infobox in the Special:CreatePage interface using the custom CreatePageImageUploadForm PHP class; requires various values to be set in the WebRequest, such as the actual uploadable file data, so merely accessing a URL like this won't work on its own, obviously. Really, the only thing that should be using this endpoint is Special:CreatePage, and hopefully in the future we can have that use the "regular" core JS API for file uploads (patches welcome!).
createpage-desc: [[Special:CreatePage|Easy to use interface]] for creating new articles
createpage-title-additional: You've followed a link to a page that doesn't exist yet. To create the page, start typing in the box below
createpage-advanced-warning: Switching editing modes may break page formatting, do you want to continue?
createpage-login-warning: By logging in now, you may lose all your unsaved text. Do you want to continue?
createpage-title-check-text: You cannot perform an action until title check has ended. Please click again on the action button to proceed.
createpage-preview-end: End of preview. You can resume your editing below:
createpage-login-required: You need to log in to upload images
createpage-upload-directory-read-only: The upload directory is not writable by the webserver
createpage-about-info: This is the simplified editor. To find out more go to [[s:Help:CreatePage|ShoutWiki Hub]].
createpage-unsaved-changes-details: You have unsaved changes. Clicking OK will result in abandoning them.
tog-createpage-redlinks: Use [http://www.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Help:CreatePage CreatePage] when following broken links
